name: Inquiry Dialogue
title: Inquiry Dialogue
subtitle: Interview historical figures
description: Create and analyze deep conversations between two historical figures based on their Wikipedia profiles.

errors.fetchError: Error retrieving data from Wikipedia for {{title}}
errors.summaryError: Could not retrieve summary for this character.
errors.technicalReflection: A technical error occurred during reflection evaluation.

setup.selectDescription: Select two historical figures from Wikipedia and define a theme for their discussion.
setup.themePlaceholder: Example: The impact of printing on society
setup.selectCharactersDescription: Choose 2-3 historical figures to participate in the discussion.
setup.discussionTopicDescription: Define the topic that will guide the conversation.
setup.exampleTopic1: The role of technology in society

chat.systemMessage: Start the dialogue between {{char1}} and {{char2}} on the topic: {{theme}}. Moderator, you can guide the conversation or let the characters interact freely.
chat.errorMessage: An error occurred while generating the response.
chat.autoErrorMessage: An error occurred while generating the automatic response.

reflection.title: Reflection on Inquiry Dialogue
reflection.description: Analyze the dialogue you witnessed. Consider the viewpoints, arguments, and what struck you.
questions: What were the key points that emerged from the dialogue between the two characters?
Were the arguments presented by the characters in line with their historical figures? Why?
Which character offered the most surprising or enlightening perspective on the topic?
How did this dialogue enrich or modify your understanding of the discussed topic?
If you could ask a question to one of the characters, what would it be and to whom would you ask it?
